review: Still learning how to use it and what is a free service and a pain service. Thought we would get more with our Amazon Prime but its tricky you may click on what you think is FREE and still see a change. No Fault of Amazon just that learning curve. The Device was quick and easy to set up and the remote comes in very handy. For the price I could not pass it up. So of the downloaded Apps are nice but they seem to be limited on what you would expect.
author: Steve of PA

review: Best thing I've purchased in awhile!
author: Ian

review: The TV Stick works great, we just plugged it into the HDM1 port & started watching & enjoying a variety of TV shows & movies. Excellent, quick response to choices, no long wait. We love it.
author: EVE SIMPSON

review: I would have given 5 stars if all series and shows were available to watch on Prime instead of needing Hulu or Netflix, etc.
author: Adriene Goldstein

review: Worked immediately. Definitely worth it even if you don't have Prime.
author: Janelle Chapman

review: Great product!! Works exactly as described!!
author: Andrew J. Weick

review: Works great in large basement, able to stream TV, Movies, Games, etc....
author: Maurice Murray

review: Works great and easy to install.
author: Paul B.

review: This fire stick is great my wife loves it I might have to buy another one so I can watch it on my tv.
author: thomas
